|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7161; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 680<!-- 680 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = 4 |fla1chip = STMicro;M25P128-VMF6PB; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5DS32M16DS-5TI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;MV88E1118;MV88E1118-NNC1; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F0:9C:E9 |oui = 88:DC:96

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = outdoor |addchip = Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3204T;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = aerohive |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = EnGenius EMP9605H |rad2modif = Mini PCI |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9220; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MMCX,N-Female |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://www.aerohive.com/pdfs/Aerohive_Datasheet_HiveAP-170-Access-Point.pdf Datasheet]
"HiveAP170-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :A typical ''[[Senao]]'' P/N sticker is also attached to a RAM chip.
On a production model, the "HiveAP170" silkscreen mentioned above is absent and, :instead, the board is branded, "7016A05140 v1.10" above screw hole MH3. There is an unpopulated header, J1, that is presumably JTAG. :Switch SW3 is a reset switch.
{{WiFiCert|WFA12615|08/26/2011}}
[[Category:English Documentation]]
